settings.heading: Frequent Shopper
settings.text: Enjoy perks including shopping vouchers, birthday treats and exclusive previews of new arrivals, events and sales.

settings.title: Upgrade
settings.text: Become a Frequent Shopper and enjoy more perks!

settings.title: Customer
settings.content:
• Sign up to become a member
  • Receive a $20 Welcome Voucher
  • Receive a $20 Voucher with every $500 accumulated spend
  • 15% off your Birthday Month

settings.title: Frequent Shopper
settings.content:
• Accumulated spending of $1000 to become a member
  • Receive a $20 Welcome Voucher
  • Receive a $50 Voucher with every $500 accumulated spend
  • 20% off your Birthday Month

settings.title: Explore Tier Benefits
settings.disc: *The accumulated spend gets reset to $0, unless there is at least one transaction within 12 months from their last purchase

settings.title: Why should I create an account?
settings.description: Upon successful activation of your account, you will receive a $20 Welcome Voucher from us — which you can utilise on your next purchase with a minimum spend of SGD 100 on regular-priced items. You will also enjoy a one-time 15% off during your Birthday Month! Creating an IN GOOD COMPANY customer account with us also puts you on the fast track to becoming a Frequent Shopper with us for life; simply accumulate your spend to SGD 1,000 (no time limit) and you’ll be entitled to enjoy even more benefits under our Frequent Shopper Program. With a registered and activated profile, you can keep track of your spend, order history, and be the first to get notified of our new collections or events.
